data.message: I administer a group (that I started) and the number of view shown on each post stopped working today. Anyone know why this would happen or how it can be corrected?  https://www.facebook.com/groups/FourthWayWorkforScientists/

replies.message: Hey James. This sounds like a bug. Can you please help us track this issue and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? http://on.fb.me/1r8Jjg4 -Sarah
I found the answer.  Facebook will not show the number of views on groups with more than 250 members.  I reduced it to less than 250 members and it works again.  Thanks for your quick reply!
